name: WIGGLESMITH
description:
WIGGLESMITH CRAFT WEAPONS WITH YOUR WIGGLY ARM TO DEFEAT THE KAPPA!

A game about wiggly phisics and weaponsmithing.

🎮Control     : Move arm/menu selection. Spacebar : Interact

Made in [+12 days] for LUDUMDARE 50 by

Ray Frutos (@TheGorondorf) -- SPRITES, SOUND EFFECTS

Marcos ´Kukiol´Alvarez (@Kukiolworks) -- COVER ART, MUSIC, PROGRAMMING
